name: set-map-names
author: Washington University School of Medicin
description:
SET THE NAME OF ONE OR MORE MAPS IN A FILE.

Sets the name of one or more maps for metric, shape, label, volume, cifti scalar or cifti label files.  You must specify either -name-file, or -from-data-file, or at least one -map option.  The three option types are mutually exclusive.

inputs.name: data-file
inputs.description: the file to set the map names of

inputs.name: opt_name_file_file
inputs.description: use a text file to replace all map names: text file containing map names, one per line

inputs.name: opt_from_data_file_file
inputs.description: use the map names from another data file: a data file with the same number of maps
